p: As a traditional medical system with a prolific history, ITM contains knowledge that can be better utilized if promoted using modern systems medicine approaches. Meanwhile, the rationale behind physiologic or pathologic processes can nowadays be made possible by analysis of complex networks [ 17]. Due to the holistic nature of ITM, deducing justifications for the concepts of the personalized approach to maintain health and treating diseases requires establishing links to modern medicine. Thus, standardization and organization of ITM concepts and drugs shall undoubtedly facilitate the validation of its theories, as has been made possible with other traditional medical systems [ 33].
